Feline::
She ran a few miles then stopped running. She was out of breath and feeling 
tired. "Damn. I hope that spider wasn't poisonous."  She looked at the bite 
area and saw it was becoming infected. "To The PIT!"  She changed to bot 
form and kept going.

The spider was a rare hybrid of a blackwidow and tarantula cross.  It's bite 
was not only a neurotoxin, but a DNA dissolver. It would slowly break down 
her animal DNA and leave only the bot intact.

She was almost to her destination.  She was feeling her spark race in her 
chest as well as feeling very fatigued.  She kept walking, but it was 
becoming an effort to move at all. She stopped and transformed into leopard 
mode. "I must obey orders. I must do what is expected of me."

She lay down on the ground and rolled over onto her side.  Her breathing was 
labored and becoming shallow.  She closed her eyes and tried to not think of 
the pain.  Her body felt like it was on fire and she was barely able to 
move.  "Matrix, you can't have me now. You took me once, and that's enough." 
she said defiantly.
